name: Airbus
membership: Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe (ASD), European Organisation for Security (EOS), Cercle des Délégués Permanents Français (CDPF), Kangaroo Group, European Satellite Operators Association (ESOA), NEREUS, A4E, ERSC, Eurospace, AFEP, AMISA2, AVISA, EBIT, BBE
goal:
Airbus is a global leader in aerospace, defence and related services.
The group includes aircraft/helicopter manufacturers Airbus, Airbus Helicopters, and Airbus Defence & Space, provider of security and defence solutions and builder of space platforms.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Research and Technology (H2020 and Horizon Europe), Aeronautics (EASA, etc.), space (policy, Galileo, Kopernicus, etc.), security (cybersecurity), defence (European Defence Policy, European Defence Fund, EDIDP), company law (EMIR, Basel regulations), Trade (WTO dispute on Large Civil Aircraft)
